name: [Asset] TutorialPack for Live Course
description:
Hello

This pack contains  Grafics and Sounds for my Live Tutorial.

The Game you see was created in the Tutorial - Link to the Video will follow.

You can use everything inside for Free.

Music by Juhani Junkala

Backgrounds by GraficKid
